name: How do I design for various screen sizes?
markup: Using a feature called responsive resize, XD helps take the chore out of resizing your design for various sizes. It takes an intelligent guess but you are always in control. If you are enamoured by this feature you can take it to the next level by defining manual contstraints that define how objects should behave during resize.
